Course.Title: ACADEMIC WRITTEN DISCOURSE II
Course.Description: Develop rhetorical strategies in English as well as skills for more effective reading, writing, critical thinking, and vocabulary development, as applied to the student's chosen major. Reading and writing emphasis. Pass/Fail. Placement by advisement only. Limited to students who are not native speakers of English.
